com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl

Class ZendeskRequestProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl.ZendeskRequestProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestProvider

    public final class ZendeskRequestProvider
extends Object
implements RequestProvider
    Provider used to retrieve Request from a Zendesk instance.

    • Method Detail

      • createRequest

        public void createRequest(String email,
                 String subject,
                 String description,
                 List<String> tags,
                 ZendeskCallback<CreateRequest> callback)
        Description copied from interface: RequestProvider
        Calls a request service to create a request on behalf of the end-user.
        Specified by:
        createRequest in interface RequestProvider
        Parameters:
        email - Users email address to identify the requester
        subject - Message describing the subject of the request
        description - More detailed description of a problem
        tags - List of labels to add to the request
        callback - Callback that will deliver a newly created request of type CreateRequest or ErrorResponse

      • createRequest

        public void createRequest(CreateRequest request,
                 ZendeskCallback<CreateRequest> callback)
        Calls a request service to create an anonymized request on behalf of the end-user. It will also do a sanity check on request validity.
        Specified by:
        createRequest in interface RequestProvider
        Parameters:
        request - Initialized RateMyAppRequest
        callback - Callback that will deliver a newly created request of type CreateRequest or ErrorResponse

      • getAllRequests

        public void getAllRequests(ZendeskCallback<List<Request>> callback)
        Description copied from interface: RequestProvider
        Gets all requests that user has opened.
        Specified by:
        getAllRequests in interface RequestProvider
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback to invoke which will return a list of Request or an ErrorResponse

      • getRequests

        public void getRequests(String status,
               ZendeskCallback<List<Request>> callback)
        Description copied from interface: RequestProvider
        Filters requests that user has opened by a status.
        Specified by:
        getRequests in interface RequestProvider
        Parameters:
        status - A comma separated list of status to filter the results by status.
        • new
        • open
        • pending
        • hold
        • solved
        • closed
        callback - The callback to invoke which will return a list of Request or an ErrorResponse

      • getComments

        public void getComments(String requestId,
               ZendeskCallback<CommentsResponse> callback)
        Description copied from interface: RequestProvider
        Gets all comments for a request.
        Specified by:
        getComments in interface RequestProvider
        Parameters:
        requestId - Id of a request. This is a String Id that will have been returned by RequestProvider.getAllRequests(ZendeskCallback) or RequestProvider.getRequests(String, ZendeskCallback)
        callback - Callback that will deliver a CommentsResponse or ErrorResponse

      • addComment

        public void addComment(String requestId,
              EndUserComment endUserComment,
              ZendeskCallback<Comment> callback)
        Calls a request service to upload a EndUserComment to a request with a given id.
        Specified by:
        addComment in interface RequestProvider
        Parameters:
        requestId - Id of a request to post this comment to
        endUserComment - A EndUserComment containig text and attachment tokens
        callback - Callback that will deliver a Comment or ErrorResponse

      • addComment

        @Deprecated
public void addComment(String requestId,
                         String message,
                         ZendeskCallback<Comment> callback)
        Deprecated. 
        Calls a request service to upload a comment to a request with a given id.

        Deprecated, please use addComment(String, com.zendesk.sdk.model.EndUserComment, ZendeskCallback)

        Specified by:
        addComment in interface RequestProvider
        Parameters:
        requestId - Id of a request to post this comment to
        message - The text of the comment to create
        callback - Callback that will deliver a Comment or ErrorResponse
